items.title: La Maison du Whisky - Premium E-Commerce
items.description: Technical leadership of Magento 2 platform, focusing on performance and security. Implementation of headless architecture with AWS and Elasticsearch.

items.title: Valrhona - B2B Platform
items.description: B2B platform redesign with Mirakl marketplace integration and SSO. Configuration of Salesforce API flows and custom authentication.

items.title: Legrand - B2B Solution
items.description: Development of Magento 2 B2B platform with advanced features for professional buyers. Modular and scalable architecture.

items.title: Chausson Matériaux - B2B E-commerce
items.description: Creation of cross-channel e-commerce platform with integrated PIM for over 20,000 products. Automation of catalogs and data flows.

about.content: Senior Magento expert with over 8 years of experience in e-commerce development. Specialized in creating robust and scalable solutions, I combine technical expertise with strategic vision to optimize e-commerce platform performance. My approach combines technical excellence with business understanding to ensure project success.

summary: Senior Magento expert with extensive experience in e-commerce development. Major projects: Magento 2 Migration for Beaumanoir Group (2022-2023), Performance Optimization for Zannier Group (2022), B2B Development for Royer Group (2021-2022), Cloud Migration for Morgan (2021), Magento 2 Platform Development for Legrand (2016-2019), and E-commerce Platform Creation for Chausson Matériaux (2010-2014). Specialized in complex migrations, performance optimization, and B2B solution development.
